00050 const char *
00051 appDir() {
00052         static char appprefix[512];
00053         int i, n;
00054 
00055         n = readlink("/proc/self/exe", appprefix, sizeof(appprefix)-1);
00056         readlink("/proc/self/exe", appprefix, sizeof(appprefix) -1);
00057         for (i = n; i > 0; i--) {
00058                 if (appprefix[i]=='/') {
00059                         appprefix[i]='\0';
00060                         break;
00061                 }
00062         }
00063         for (i = n; i > 0; i--) {
00064                 if (appprefix[i]=='/') {
00065                         appprefix[i]='\0';
00066                         break;
00067                 }
00068         }
00069         return appprefix;
00070 }

00073 MathMLEdit::MathMLEdit(const wxString& title)
00074         : wxFrame(0, -1, title) {
00075

00077                 wxDefaultSize, wxTE_MULTILINE);

00080

00082         testimage = new wxStaticBitmap(this, -1, wxBitmap(), wxDefaultPosition);

00084                         wxLC_ICON);

00086                 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, 0, 0,
00087                 wxCB_READONLY | wxCB_SORT);

00089                 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, 0, 0,
00090                 wxCB_READONLY | wxCB_SORT);

00092                 wxDefaultPosition, wxDefaultSize, 0, 0,
00093                 wxCB_READONLY | wxCB_SORT);
00094 
00095         wxString dir;
00096 #if wxUSE_UNICODE
00097         dir = wxConvLibc.cMB2WC(appDir());
00098 #else
00099         dir = appDir();
00100 #endif
00101         printf("dir: %s\n", appDir());
00102         setExamplesDir(dir + wxT("/share/libmathml/testsuite"));
00103         dirlist->SetSelection(dirlist->FindString(wxT("Presentation")));
00104         setExamplesSubDir(wxT("Presentation"));
00105         subdirlist->SetSelection(subdirlist->FindString(wxT("GeneralLayout")));

00111 //      setActive(subdirlist, "GeneralLayout");
00112 //      setActive(subsubdirlist, "msqrt-mroot");
00113 
00114         // painter settings controls
00115         fontlist = new wxComboBox(this, FONT_ID, wxEmptyString, wxDefaultPosition,
00116                 wxDefaultSize, 0, 0, wxCB_READONLY | wxCB_SORT);
00117         wxFontEnumerator fe;
00118         fe.EnumerateFacenames();

00125

00144         ptr_sizer->Add(testicons, 1, wxEXPAND);
00145         hb = new wxBoxSizer(wxHORIZONTAL);

00161 void
00162 MathMLEdit::setMML(wxCommandEvent&) {
00163         MMLReader mr;
00164         printf("reading buffer of size %i\n", qte->GetValue().size());
00165         const wxCharBuffer cb = wxConvLibc.cWX2MB(qte->GetValue());
00166         DOMString xml = (const char*)cb;
00167         if (mr.parse(xml)) {
00168                 ql->SetLabel(wxT("No errors"));
00169                 mv->setDocument(mr.document());
00170         } else {
00171                 const char *c = mr.error().utf8();
00172                 ql->SetLabel(wxstring(c));
00173                 mv->setDocument(NULL);
00174         }
00175 }
00176 void
00177 MathMLEdit::OnDirCombo(wxCommandEvent &event ) {
00178         if (event.m_id == DIRLST_ID) {
00179                 setExamplesSubDir(event.GetString());
00180         } else if (event.m_id == SUBDIRLST_ID) {
00181                 setExamplesSubSubDir(event.GetString());
00182         } else if (event.m_id == SUBSUBDIRLST_ID) {
00183                 loadExampleDir(event.GetString());
00184         }
00185 }
00186 void
00187 MathMLEdit::setExamplesDir(const wxString &dir) {
00188         examplesdir = dir;
00189         wxDir d(dir);
00190         // find all subdirectories
00191         dirlist->Clear();
00192         wxString entry;
00193         bool cont = d.GetFirst(&entry, wxEmptyString, wxDIR_DIRS);
00194         while (cont) {
00195                 dirlist->Append(entry);
00196                 cont = d.GetNext(&entry);
00197         }
00198         if (d.HasFiles(wxT("*.mml"))) {
00199                 dirlist->Append(wxT("."));
00200         }
00201         wxString sel;
00202         if (dirlist->GetCount() > 0) {
00203                 sel = dirlist->GetStringSelection();
00204         }
00205         setExamplesSubDir(sel);
00206 }
00207 void
00208 MathMLEdit::setExamplesSubDir(const wxString &dir) {
00209         subdir = examplesdir;
00210         subdir += wxT("/") + dir;
00211         wxDir d(subdir);
00212         // find all subdirectories
00213         subdirlist->Clear();
00214         wxString entry;
00215         bool cont = d.GetFirst(&entry, wxEmptyString, wxDIR_DIRS);
00216         while (cont) {
00217                 subdirlist->Append(entry);
00218                 cont = d.GetNext(&entry);
00219         }
00220         if (d.HasFiles(wxT("*.mml"))) {
00221                 subdirlist->Append(wxT("."));
00222         }
00223         wxString sel;
00224         if (subdirlist->GetCount() > 0) {
00225                 sel = subdirlist->GetStringSelection();
00226         }
00227         setExamplesSubSubDir(sel);

00250 void
00251 MathMLEdit::loadExampleDir(const wxString &sssdir) {
00252         dir = subsubdir + wxT("/") + sssdir;
00253         wxDir d(dir);
00254         testicons->ClearAll();
00255         wxString entry;
00256         bool cont = d.GetFirst(&entry, wxT("*.mml"), wxDIR_FILES);
00257         il.RemoveAll();
00258         testicons->SetImageList(&il, wxIMAGE_LIST_NORMAL);
00259         wxImage i;
00260         //i.AddHandler(wxPNGHandler);
00261         while (cont) {
00262                 wxFileName fn(dir + wxT("/")
00263                         + entry.SubString(0, entry.size()-4) + wxT("png"));
00264                 if (fn.FileExists()) {
00265                         i.LoadFile(fn.GetFullPath());
00266                         int w = i.GetWidth();
00267                         int h = i.GetHeight();
00268                         if (w > h) {
00269                                 w = 32;
00270                                 h = 32*h/w;
00271                         } else {
00272                                 w = 32*w/h;
00273                                 h = 32;
00274                         }
00275                         i.Rescale(w, h);
00276                         wxBitmap bm(i);
00277                         int j = il.Add(bm);
00278                         testicons->InsertItem(testicons->GetItemCount(),
00279                                 entry, j);
00280                 } else {
00281                         testicons->InsertItem(testicons->GetItemCount(), entry);
00282                 }
00283                 cont = d.GetNext(&entry);
00284         }
00285         testicons->Arrange(wxLIST_ALIGN_SNAP_TO_GRID);
00286         testicons->Show(testicons->GetItemCount() != 0);
00287 }
00288 #include <cstdio>
00289 void
00290 MathMLEdit::showFile(wxListEvent &event) {
00291         wxString f = dir + wxT("/") + event.GetText();
00292         wxFileName fn(f);
00293         if (!fn.FileExists() || fn.IsDir()) return;
00294         fn = f.SubString(0, f.size() - 4) + wxT("png");
00295         wxImage img(1, 1);
00296         if (fn.FileExists()) {
00297                 img.LoadFile(fn.GetFullPath());
00298         }
00299         testimage->SetBitmap(img);
00300         testimage->GetParent()->Refresh();
00301 
00302         FILE *file = fopen(f.mb_str(), "r");
00303         wxString text;
00304         if (file) {
00305                 fseek(file, 0, SEEK_END);
00306                 long size = ftell(file);
00307                 char *utf8 = new char[size+1];
00308                 fseek(file, 0, SEEK_SET);
00309                 long r = fread(utf8, 1, size, file);
00310                 if (r == size) {
00311                         utf8[size] = '\0';
00312                         text = wxConvLibc.cMB2WX(utf8);
00313                 }
00314                 delete [] utf8;
00315         }
00316         qte->SetValue(text);
00317 }

00319 MathMLEdit::OnFontSpin(wxSpinEvent &e) {

00323 }

00325 MathMLEdit::OnFontCmd(wxCommandEvent &) {

00329 }
